Class Game

java.lang.Object
ijae.xgalead00.Game
public class Game extends Object
Main game controller class.

Manages the game board, entities, game loop, and user interface (views and HUD).

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs a new Game tied to a Stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary JavaFX stage

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Initializes the game UI and prepares the first level. Sets up the game and menu views, input, and initial board rendering.

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel(String path)
      Loads a level from a given file path.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the level file

    • startGameLoop

      private void startGameLoop()
      Starts the main game loop, updating entities at intervals defined by gameSpeed.

    • update

      private void update()
      Updates the game state.

      Handles player and ghost movements, animations, tile events, collision detection, win/loss conditions, and redraws the game view.

    • setGameSpeed

      public void setGameSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the speed of the game in milliseconds per update. Updates the timeline's KeyFrame without restarting the loop.
      Parameters:
      speed - milliseconds per frame

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns:
      the game board

    • getGameView

      public GameView getGameView()
      Returns:
      the GameView instance

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts or restarts the current level

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game loop if paused, or starts it if not running

    • getGameLoop

      public javafx.animation.Timeline getGameLoop()
      Returns:
      the Timeline object controlling the game loop
